topic.title: Assessment And Plan Section2 - conformance rules

section.p: This section represents the clinician's conclusions and working assumptions that will guide treatment of the patient. The Assessment and Plan Section may be combined or separated to meet local policy requirements. See also the Assessment Section: templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.8 and Plan of Treatment Section (V2): templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.10:2014-06-09

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-7705, CONF:1098-10381, CONF:1098-32583 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.9"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Assessment And Plan Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.9)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15353)/@code="51847-2" Assessment and Plan (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15354, CONF:1098-32141)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-7708, CONF:1098-15448)
Conforms to Planned Act2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.39:2014-06-09)
SHALL conform to Assessment And Plan Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.9)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15353)/@code="51847-2" Assessment and Plan (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15354, CONF:1098-32141)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7707, R2.0=CONF:1098-7707)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-7708, CONF:1098-15448)
Conforms to Planned Act2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.39:2014-06-09)
